API.title: Finding the International Space Station
API.paragraph: In this API bot, you can entSer your longitude and latitude, and you will get a mail when you could see in the sky the International Space Station.

API.title: Tracking Your Habits Every Day
API.paragraph: In this API bot, you can enter your habits you want to track, and then you can enter it every day and you will be able to see it in the Pixela web app.

API.title: Stocks
API.paragraph: In this API bot, you will be able to enter your stocks you are investing in and send you a message every day with: the value of the stock on opening hour yesterday and today and the percentage in which it grew or lowered.

Automations and Selenium.title: WhatsApp Sender
Automations and Selenium.paragraph: This automation library helped me in a lot of diffrent projects because i like to see all my notifications in my whatsapp. this uses selenium and you can send messages gifs images and vedeos

Automations and Selenium.title: File Cleaner
Automations and Selenium.paragraph: In this small project I fixed a day to day problem and it is cleaning my files. This script saves me a lot of time because it runs every day and insted of looking for files it will be in the proper place.

Automations and Selenium.title: Birthday Sender
Automations and Selenium.paragraph: This automation checks every day if it is one of the dates in a database. If it is, it sends a happy birthday email from a different DB to the birthday person.

Automations and Selenium.title: Sunday Motivation
Automations and Selenium.paragraph: This is an automation that uses a motivation quote api to send you every sunday an email with a quote from that api, to start your weak.

Automations and Selenium.title: Apartment finder
Automations and Selenium.paragraph: This automation is a selenium base automation witch goes to a fabricated apartment finder website and findes all the apartments that sute you based on the data you give it.

Automations and Selenium.title: cookie clicker
Automations and Selenium.paragraph: This is a selenium based automation witch goes to the populer game called cookie clicker and clickes on the cookie untill it has an ability to upgrade in witch it upgrades and continues to click.

Automations and Selenium.title: Net-Speed
Automations and Selenium.paragraph: This is a selenium based automation witch goes to the network speed website and runs it and returns your download and upload speed.

Flask.title: Authentication
Flask.paragraph: This flask website shows you a secret file after you log in, this was a project for handling passwords.

Flask.title: Blog
Flask.paragraph: This is a flask blog app. you can log in and seeread and comint on the sighte itself. if you have permissions like me you can create and edit the blogs enjoy browsing it.

Flask.title: Favret Books
Flask.paragraph: This is my flask website that you can see all my favert books and you can add new books using a book api.

Flask.title: Cafe API
Flask.paragraph: This cafe website finds all the cafes in your aria using an cafe api. I use this API a lot because it has a lot of developer options as you can see in the next project.

Flask.title: Cafe Rating
Flask.paragraph: This flask web application you can rate all cafe with a few parms tast wifi and more. enjoy browsing through itðŸ˜Š

Flask.title: Top 10 Movies
Flask.paragraph: This flask website you I put my top 10 movies. you can add movies and rate them and even write a rivew about them, enjoy.

Flask.title: hier lower website
Flask.paragraph: In this flask website I took the functinality of my basic hier lower game and put it in flask website, enjoy.

webscraping.title: Movies
webscraping.paragraph: This is a webscraping code that returns to you a list of top 100 movies acording to the EMPIRE website.

webscraping.title: Spotify
webscraping.paragraph: This webscraping code runs uses top 100 songs from billboard website and makes goes to your spotify user and makes a new play list for you.

webscraping.title: Amazon Price
webscraping.paragraph: In this webscraping code you can enter your favret amazon prodacts and a number you are willing to pay for it and when the price drops down to the price you are willing to pay you will get an email that the price droped it it is a good time to by it.

Tkinter GUI.title: Flash Cards
Tkinter GUI.paragraph: I dont know about you but i have a problam with remambering stuf before a test, so in this project i disided to help myself to fix the problam. I created a flash card gui so that before a test I can go through q&a's. for this I used hebrew words to study for the psichometry.

Tkinter GUI.title: Password Saver
Tkinter GUI.paragraph: These days we have a problem with password securety, it is recomended to use a new password for every new thing you sign in so I created a password saver app witch saves all your passwords and you can even genorait new password.

Tkinter GUI.title: quizzler
Tkinter GUI.paragraph: This GUI project is a questioner witch has a few random questions from a api data base. you get 10 q you can answer and it gives you your score in the end.

Tkinter GUI.title: Timer
Tkinter GUI.paragraph: This is a GUI project witch has Pomodoro consept of timing your prodactive time. studys have shown that this is the best way to stay prodactivein. enjoy

Tkinter GUI.title: To-Do List
Tkinter GUI.paragraph: This is my most used GUI app. It helps me orgnize my days and weeks better. hope it helps you as well.

Games.title: Guess The State
Games.paragraph: This is a guess the state game, you enter a US state and if is correct it shows you on the map where it is and if you remember all the states you win. Lets see if you can win.

Games.title: Pong
Games.paragraph: I alwais like the game pong so I diceaded to create it. It was a very fun expireance. Hope you have as much fun playing it as I hade creating it.

Games.title: Snake
Games.paragraph: This is a classic game i dont think I coldnt add this fun game. Hope you enjoy.

React_Apps.title: Popcorn Time
React_Apps.paragraph: In this React project I created a popcoren-time look a like website. I made this website so that I'll have a website to add my movies in the future so that ill have my own movie website.

React_Apps.title: Packing Agent
React_Apps.paragraph: I have a problem remembering things that is why i created multiple to do lists, for example this is a website I created a to-do list before trips where I can add, delete, edit and check-off items on the website so that I never forget. Enjoy browsing through it.

React_Apps.title: calculaters
React_Apps.paragraph: this is a small app with a few calculaters such as tip calculater, date finder and a money tracker between friends. enjoy.

React_Apps.title: chatApp
React_Apps.paragraph: In this app I created a chat app. you are able to create a user and create a chat with one or more users and send each other messages. This uses fastAPI and chat engine service in the backend and react on the frontend.

Js_App.title: Guess The Number
Js_App.paragraph: In this js project i created a guess the number game. every time you play there is a secret number between 1 and 20 hiden and every time you guess your score lowers by one and it displays you a message hier or lower or if you guessed the correct number then it changes the css to green and you can play again by pressing the AGAIN button. enjoy playing.

Js_App.title: Pig Game
Js_App.paragraph: In this game I created a 2 player game where 2 players are tring to reach 100 points. you start by rolling the dice if you get 1 the user changes, numbers between 2 and 6 you add to your count but only after you press on the hold button it permenntly saves your count. enjoy playing.
